data.name: Crusader Kings II: African Unit Pack
data.detailed_description:
Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these unique unit graphics for the African states south of the Sahara:
  • Nubia
  • Abyssinia
  • Mali
  • Songhay
  • Ghana
data.about_the_game:
Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these unique unit graphics for the African states south of the Sahara:
  • Nubia

data.short_description: Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these unique unit graphics for the African states south of the Sahara:NubiaAbyssiniaMaliSonghayGhana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900 video card , 512mb graphics memory required, 1024*768 resolution
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X-compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers , Internet Connection for multiplayer, Crusader Kings II Base Game

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Mac OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers , Internet Connection for multiplayer, Crusader Kings II Base Game

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: IntelR PentiumR IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard disk space: 2 Gb
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce
    > 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required.
